resources.string:
Hi there, we are computer engineering master's students working on our master thesis. It studies BLE and its potential. 

We developed this app to detect BLE beacons and based on the RSSI value that they transmit we can calculate the distance from our device to the beacon. We use some techniques to smooth the signal and therefore get a more accurate distance. The idea of this app is to share our work and try to get some feedback from you so that we can improve our algorithms. 

You can contact us through the email announced in the main menu or using the option 'Contact Us'. 


Thank you for installing our app.
Press the button to start scanning
Please select .csv file from Beacons Scanner folder
Log file saved to folder Beacons Scanner/Eddystone/
Log file saved to folder Beacons Scanner/IBeacon/
Log folder is empty. First create log files
Please grant location access so this app can detect beacons.
Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover beacons when in the background.
Please grant storage access so this app can create log files about the beacons.
Since storage access has not been granted, this app will not be able to create log files with information about the received RSSI and distance from the beacons.
